Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 24.0.9-13
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 24.0.9-13. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-engine is earlier than 24.0.9-13, affected by CVE-2024-24786
